Introduction
This topic contains information about control of and follow-up on examination requests, including
determining the appropriate suspense date for examinations
checking the status of examination requests under special circumstances
modifying and canceling examination scheduling requests (ESRs) in theÂ Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)
continued end product (EP) control when examinations are rescheduled
disability benefits questionnaires (DBQs) and examination cancellations
documenting examination cancellations and rejections
, and
obtaining examination reports
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Control of Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
